name: National Institutes of Technology, Science Education and Research (Amendment) Act, 2017
1: 1. (1) This Act may be called the National Institutes of Technology, Science Education and Research (Amendment) Act, 2017.(2) It shall come into force on such date as the Central Government may, by notification in the Official Gazette, appoint.
2: 2. In the Second Schedule to the National Institutes of Technology, Science Education and Research Act, 2007, after serial number 5 and the entries relating thereto, the following serial numbers and entries shall be inserted, namely:-
